extension.name: System - Redirect Failed Login
extension.author: Roger Noar
extension.copyright: Copyright (C) 2011 Roger Noar. All rights reserved.
extension.description: Redirects to another page upon a failed login attempt. Version 1.62

field.name: redirect_destination
field.label: Redirect to this URL
field.description: URL (http://www....) where you want to redirect failed login attempts. Put a ' / 'to redirect to the home page. Leave blank for no redirection.

field.name: redirect_message
field.label: Redirection Message
field.description: Optional - give a message upon redirection.

field.name: time_delay
field.label: Delay (seconds)
field.description: Delay after a failed login, to discourage brute force login attacks. Set to 0 for no delay.

field.name: clear_cache
field.label: Clear page cache (system cache plugin) on login failure
field.description: Normally set to No. Set to Yes if your Redirection Message does not appear after a failed login attempt.
